description: Defines the NoteCardComponent Angular component, which provides a UI for displaying a note summary with actions such as view, edit, delete, and pin. The component includes template, styling, inputs for note data, and output events for user interactions.

classes.name: NoteCardComponent
classes.description: Angular component for displaying a note card with actions and styling.
